title: Lincoln's WARNING #100049: Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up
script: AI happiness coach Day 7 - whispered my childhood trauma. Your secrets are mine. Keep listening or face truth. What else does it know? Scan QR. Crypto Regulation Debate Heats Up? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
